# Feature Documentation Template

> **Use this template for documenting new features**

## Overview
Brief description of the feature and its purpose.

## Technical Implementation
- **Frontend**: Angular components and services
- **Backend**: API endpoints and data processing
- **Database**: Data models and persistence
- **External APIs**: Third-party integrations

## User Interface
- **Components**: List of UI components
- **Routes**: Application routing
- **Styling**: CSS/SCSS implementation
- **Responsive**: Mobile and desktop considerations

## API Integration
- **Endpoints**: Backend API routes
- **Data Models**: Request/response formats
- **Error Handling**: Failure scenarios and fallbacks
- **Testing**: API endpoint testing strategy

## Development Notes
- **Setup**: Local development requirements
- **Configuration**: Environment variables and settings
- **Dependencies**: Required packages and tools
- **Known Issues**: Current limitations or bugs

## Testing Strategy
- **Unit Tests**: Component and service testing
- **Integration Tests**: API and database testing
- **E2E Tests**: User workflow testing
- **Manual Testing**: QA checklist

## Documentation
- **User Guide**: How to use the feature
- **Developer Guide**: Implementation details
- **API Documentation**: Endpoint specifications
- **Troubleshooting**: Common issues and solutions

---
*Use this template when creating new feature documentation in the [[04-Features]] folder*
